Name: Tasty Defense
About the game: The world of sweets is under threat. Sharp peppers have conceived the sharpest plan and want to capture their home table. Don't let them do it, go through 10 tactical levels and show what you can do. Extraordinary tower defense game with subjects of strategy: build sweet defensive towers to defend your own table from the invasion of unsafe monsters, bitter peppers. The task of all levels is to destroy opponents before they enter the portal movement. Each tower is unique and has its own special characteristics: Cupcake Tower - chocolate treat that takes up 4 cells and deals significant damage over a large area The marshmallow tower is the most affordable! It has low damage and a small area, but has a large radius and due to its small cost great combat potential Ice cream tower - ice cream is a universal remedy for dealing with spicy, don't you believe it? Try it. Tower received the status as the most accurate for a reason. Waffle fence - no one will pass, waffles stand to protect the borders Butterscotch - placed on the road and causes significant damage.
